english.segment1: A morning rainbow fills the sky, I think I'm dead. But I know I'm not dead yet. I've been missing You, You've been here all along. I guess sometimes I just forget. There was comfort in Your breath. You made me believe that life was worth it
english.segment2: Chorus: I'm a brand new man. I will never be the same. I'm a brand new man. I will never be the same
english.segment3: I remember the day that I met You. The emptiness I had. Could fill a mountain. And I believed it was true, My pain would never go away. But there was comfort in Your breath, You made me believe that life was worth it.
english.segment5: And I'm not looking back. My past is far behind me, yeah. I'm stronger every day. You've made me a brand new man
